description:
Ability Office Standard offers 3 core applications essential for home and business, Word Processor, Spreadsheet and Presentation, in one affordable office suite. It also includes a Photoalbum and quick application Launcher. Just perfect for working from home, allowing files to be edited and exchanged with those back in the office, and absolutely ideal for students and school children.
    It's so easy to get started with Ability Office Standard, thanks to its very familiar user interface. Create, load from, edit and save to Microsoft® Word, Excel, and Powerpoint.
summary: Ability Office Standard contains a Word Processor, Spreadsheet and Presentation application.
author: Ability Software International
